name: P-6 Label French Terry Full-Zip Hoody - Men's

features: Ringspun 85% organic cotton/15% postconsumer recycled polyester French terry blend is garment washed for softness; recycled polyester comes from postconsumer-waste PET bottles; Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
Classic full-zip hoody with a zip-through, stand-up collar and set-in sleeves
Two side-entry handwarmer pockets with kangaroo-pouch pocket styling
Rib-knit cuffs and hem for warmth and a great fit
Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free
Patagonia graphics are original works created both by our designers as well as freelance creatives
